anya-e1001n10:2: Āsā lokitthiyo nāma, velā tāsaṃ na vijjati;
anya-e1001n10:3: Sārattā ca pagabbhā ca, sikhī sabbaghaso yathā;
anya-e1001n10:4: Tasmā tāyo hitvāna, brūheyya vivekaṃ sudhī.
anya-e1001n10:5: Āsā lokitthiyo nāma, velā tāsaṃ na vijjati;
anya-e1001n10:6: Sāratthā ca pagabbhā ca, sikhī sabbaghaso yathā;
anya-e1001n10:9: Loke hi aṅganā nāma, kodhanā mittabhedikā;
anya-e1001n10:12: Yathā nadī ca pantho ca, pānāgāraṃ sabhā papā;
anya-e1001n10:13: Evaṃ lokitthiyo nāma, nāsaṃ kujjhanti paṇḍitā.
anya-e1001n10:15: Sabbā nadī vaṅkagatī, sabbe kaṭṭhamayā vanā;
anya-e1001n10:19: Tasmā ghatañca aggiñca, nekatra ṭhapaye budho.
anya-e1001n10:21: Itthīnañca dhanaṃ rūpaṃ, purisānaṃ vijjā dhanaṃ;
anya-e1001n10:22: Bhikkhūnañca dhanaṃ sīlaṃ, rājānañca dhanaṃ balaṃ.
anya-e1001n10:30: Dvitipati nārī ceva, vihāradviti bhikkhu ca;
anya-e1001n10:33: Ratti vinā na candimā, vīcivinā ca sāgaro;
anya-e1001n10:36: Asantuṭṭhā yatī naṭṭhā, santuṭṭhāpi ca patthi vā;
anya-e1001n10:37: Salajjā gaṇikā naṭṭhā, nillajjā ca kulitthiyo.
anya-e1001n10:48: Itthīpi hi ekacciyā, seyyā posa janādhipa;
anya-e1001n10:57: Āsīvisampi āsīde, yena daṭṭho na jīvati;
anya-e1001n10:58: Na tveva eko ekāya, mātugāmena sallape.
anya-e1001n10:60: Na hi sabbesu ṭhānesu, puriso hoti paṇḍito;
anya-e1001n10:61: Itthīpi paṇḍitā hoti, tattha tattha vicakkhaṇā.
anya-e1001n10:63: Na hi sabbesu ṭhānesu, puriso hoti paṇḍito;
anya-e1001n10:67: Sītakāle bhave uṇhaṃ, uṇhakāle ca sītalaṃ.
